game.name: Razortron 2000
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: RAZORTRON 2000은 레트로 하향식 무한 레이싱 게임입니다. 이 연애 편지에서 최고 기록을 깨고, 새 자동차의 잠금을 해제하고, 순위표의 맨 위로 올라가고 동전 먹는 아케이드 기계 시대에 도전하십시오!
game.shortDescriptionEn: RAZORTRON 2000 is a retro top-down endless racing game. Try to beat your highscore, unlock new cars and climb your way to the top of the leaderboards on this love letter to coin eater arcade machines era!

reviewHighlights.text: Retro-styled, top-down racing game where the goal is to complete tracks and earn points ✅10 vehicles to unlock, but you must complete 10 challenges ✅T...
[b]This game reminded me the vibe of using 90s handheld arcade consoles[/b]
